title: Mad Games Tycoon v0.150416A
description:
Information: Old save games can not be loaded.

- Now you can choose the release date of games.
- Added Fanletters in the statistics menu.
- New options for quality assurance added.
- Bugs degrade the game review.
- Connecting lines for office added.
- When you select a employee, you can see now his office.
- "Remove Bugs" and "Marketing" now give experience.
- Salary for contract work now depends on the difficulty.
- Different languages have been updated.
- Balance: Legendary mode is now more difficult.
- Balance: Games have a stronger influence on the popularity of the platforms.
- Bug removed: AddOns now have at least one point.
- Bug removed: Fixed problems with own marketing
